ComicInfo.Summary: Goddess Rising [Part 1]: Purgatori cements her role as lord of the vampires by killing off the competition but discovers that even this lofty title is not enough to satisfy one who used to be a goddess. As she tries to discover the key that will allow her to ascend to her former glory, she discovers that her lover and ally, Satrina, is secretly betraying her. Purgatori kills Satrina and rips out her heart.
ComicInfo.Title: Goddess Rising [Part 1]
